snippet: The cosmetics maker has agreed to settle complaints that advertisements for some of its skin care products were deceptive, the Federal Trade Commission said on Monday.
abstract: Federal Trade Commission says that cosmetics maker L'Oreal USA has agreed to settle complaints that advertisements for some of its skin care products were deceptive.
lead_paragraph: The cosmetics maker has agreed to settle complaints that advertisements for some of its skin care products were deceptive, the Federal Trade Commission said on Monday.

headline.main: L’Oréal Settles With U.S. Over Skin Care Claims
headline.print_headline: L’Oréal Settles With U.S. Over Skin Care Claims
